appShortcutName: Easy Ear Trainer for Chord Progressions
appDisplayName: Easy Ear Trainer for Chord Progressions
description: Simple ear training for musicians to recognize different chords. This is a really simple Ear training app for chord progressions. Plays a chord progression starting with the tonic (I) and plays 4 other chords afterwards. Currently the app doesn't have many other featuresy but inversions, dominant chords and different settings to customize your practice are planned for the future. **OpenSource:** This app is open source. Feel free to submit bug reports or feature requests
